Articles.Content:
I have decided to start attempting challenges, and this was the first one I picked. As it seemed easy and (to my knowledge) no one has done it before, I decided to circumnavigate Bop. The story is told in the Imgur album.
[imgur]VvZ0R[/imgur]
I think I went about 1/5 of the way around today, and will hopefully do more tomorrow. Edited November 25, 2015 by SmartS=true
Psst... You need [ and ] tags around imgur and other BB codes. Looking forward to seeing this once you have. :cool:

[quote name='CatastrophicFailure']Psst... You need [ and ] tags around imgur and other BB codes. Looking forward to seeing this once you have. :cool:[/QUOTE]
Thanks! Wasn't active at all over the summer, so I forgot a few things.

Good luck! I tell ya, these small bodies sure are easy. Too bad, I get nice comfortable a G on Tylo. While you'll be floating and drifting everywhere.


-SPAddict
Gewd Luckie

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

And I thought the flag crashed glitch only happened on Tylo...
